name: go-cloud-fn
description: A Go thing designed to test Google cloud functions https://cloud.google.com/functions/docs/quickstart.

scripts.build: webpack --config node-compat/webpack.config.js && gopherjs build main.go node-compat/polyfill.inc.js -o index.js
scripts.dev: test -f index.js || npm run build; node node-compat/server
